summary: Social video sharing app with team features, profile management, and Twitter-style video posts
architectural_notes: Video posts displayed in social feed format with user avatars and team branding
User profile system with customizable profile pictures and about pages

existing_features.title: Create a profile page displaying user information including profile picture, username, and about me bio
Add profile picture upload component that allows users to select and upload images for their profile, similar to TeamIconUploader
Display team footage videos in Twitter-style card format with poster's profile picture and team icon to the left of the video
Add delete button to video cards that allows the video uploader or team leader to remove videos
Update AppHeader navigation to include a link to the user's profile page

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an about me page for user profiles
Display videos in Twitter-style format with poster's pfp and team icon
Add a profile picture field to user profiles that stores image data as a Blob
Add an 'about me' text field to user profiles for bio/description content
Implement backend method to delete team footage videos by video ID, restricted to the video uploader or team leader

projectName: Add user profile pictures, about me page, video deletion, and Twitter-style video display
